thread.title: John Baker
thread.title_full: Veterans United Home Loans reviewed by John Baker

author: John Baker
title: John Baker
text: I was a victim of efforts to minimize my service by giving me a General Discharge under honorable conditions by a racist officer. That happened in the 1960's to many black members of the armed forces. All the more incredible to see the support received ever since. I also got a B.S. and MBA with my veterans benefits. THANKS!
